footer.name: Alexey Hohlov
footer.description:
Turning ideas into functional and responsive interfaces.
 Ready to build great products.

about.title: About Me
about.text: I specialize in developing the <accent>frontend</accent> of websites and <accent>web applications</accent>, with a strong focus on <accent>clean</accent>, maintainable <accent>code</accent>, modern practices, and thoughtful architecture. I build <accent>interfaces</accent> that not only look good but also work <accent>reliably</accent>. By education, I am a network engineer, which gives me a broad technical background.
about.subtext: On this page, you can <accent>explore</accent> my <accent>projects</accent>, technical <accent>skills</accent>, and find my <accent>contact</accent> details to get in touch.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: Core Frameworks: <blue>React</blue>, <green>Vue</green>. <accent>Development</accent> with TypeScript. <accent>Semantic</accent> and cross-browser <accent>markup</accent> using CSS/<accent>Sass</accent>. Deep understanding of their ecosystems — state management, routing, animations, validation, <accent>API</accent> integration.
skills.subtext: Extensive experience in <accent>adapting</accent> UI libraries and developing custom <accent>component</accent> systems. I build reusable, well-documented, and <accent>accessible</accent> UI kits.

items.content: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue.js (Vue3 + Composition API), Next.js
Sass, SCSS, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Motion, React Transition Group
React Hook Form, Yup, Formik, VeeValidate
React Router, Material UI, Radix UI, PrimeReact, Swiper, i18next, dnd-kit, Day.js, EmailJS, uuid, Vue Draggable, Vue Router, Axios

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: This section showcases <accent>examples</accent> of my work. Each <accent>project</accent> includes a live demo of the deployed <accent>application</accent>, its tech stack, and direct links to its GitHub <accent>repositories</accent>. Here you can evaluate not only the final <accent>result</accent> but also my <accent>approach</accent> to problem-solving, code <accent>organization</accent>, and attention to <accent>detail</accent>.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtext: Prefer <accent>other</accent> ways to get in touch? You can <accent>reach out</accent> to me <accent>directly</accent>, via social media, or through <accent>messengers</accent>. You'll find all my <accent>contact</accent> details <accent>below</accent>.
